name: FadeCloud
description: Development of the Cube Generator plugin for Skyblock.

projects.name: Cube Generator
projects.description: A 'Cube Generator' is an item that - when placed generates - a bedrock cube with ores inside of it. The ores inside can be mined by players, and will be automatically added to a virtual storage system.

media.caption: Placement / breaking of a Cube Generator.
An island with a Cube Generator placed on it.
